channel.title: GI Turbo - The Town are Victorious!
channel.description:
# G! Turbo! - Wazza Edition
# Average Rules.
* Game starts when/if we get enough players. * Days are 15 minutes. Twilight is 2 minutes. Nights are 5 minutes, unless I’m a failure and extend it. * Early day actions will be processed during the day, late day actions will be processed during Twilight, due to me being a failure once more. * There can be more than one King, but only a King election will take place once there are no Kings remaining. * I’m on PC, so don’t have mercy, feel free to make me want to die. * The amount of players are infinite but there must be at least 7 players.
1. Italy 2. Intensify 3. Insanity 4. Amelia 5. Maximus 6. KyoDaz 7. PsychoKang
# Backups:
# Spectators:
1.
# There is no line for classes until the game begins.

proceeded to carry town to a day 1 win that happened faster than rokugan
and amelia was killed by their own cursed creation

item.title: GI Turbo - The Town are Victorious!
item.dc:creator: Wazza
item.description:
They were literally the most offtopic post so I really didn’t care :^)

Marshal:

The poison will take effect at the start of the day. Doesn’t happen d1. There’s no such thing as a d1 poison, because poisons happen during night and take effect next SoD

Shrug, oh well :^)

Read full topic
